Conference Management Workflow.title: Choose license
Conference Management Workflow.desc: Choose the license appropriate for your conference. If you are not an experienced user, we recommend to choose a license which includes helpdesk.

Conference Management Workflow.title: Create a demo version
Conference Management Workflow.desc: You can create a demo version of your conference to test various features of Conference.

Conference Management Workflow.title: Create conference Web pages
Conference Management Workflow.desc: Conference Web pages can be created either in Conference or externally. Conference can generate a wordpress website integrated with the program. If you want your conference to have your own Web pages, fill the url in settting page.

Conference Management Workflow.title: If you are going to use the multi-track model, add tracks
Conference Management Workflow.desc: If you are going to use a multi-track model, you should add tracks before you start inviting people on your program committee. If you are not using tracks, ignore this step.

Conference Management Workflow.title: Invite or add program committee members
Conference Management Workflow.desc: Program committee is in charge of organizing reviewing and discussing papers. If you have a multi-track conference, track chairs invite program committee members on their tracks, otherwise chairs invite all PC members.

Conference Management Workflow.title: Add your program committee list to the conference Web pages
Conference Management Workflow.desc: It can be automatically done if you are using our wordpress host.

Conference Management Workflow.title: Add submission instructions to your conference Web pages
Send out your call for papers
When all submissions arrived, open paper bidding
Assign submissions to your program committee for reviewing
Send notifications and/or reviews to the authors
Publish the list of accepted papers
Make conference proceedings or simply collect final version of accepted papers
